name: ChristmasCountdown
0:
”Alexa, open christmas countdown”
”Alexa, start christmas countdown”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: christmas countdown
des: Open the skill and Alexa will automatically tell you how many days remain until Christmas every year! It comes with many different phrases that Alexa will say to open and close her statement. Also enjoy fun sounds to go with it!
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
